wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Henry White (12 November 1881 – after 1909) was an English footballer who played as an outside right for Stockport County in the Football League. He also played for Chesham Generals, Grays United, Brighton & Hove Albion, Carlisle United, Exeter City and Watford. At Watford and Chesham, White played alongside his younger brother, Charlie.

response: Thomas, Tom or Tommy White may refer to:
* Tommy White (artist), see List of Guggenheim Fellowships awarded in 2007
* Tommy White, a character in A-Haunting We Will Go
* Tommy White (footballer, born 1881) (1881–?), English footballer for Stockport County
* Tommy White (footballer, born 1908) (1908–1967), Everton and England footballer
